summary: Iteration 35 Testing Complete - All 6 features/bug fixes verified. Backend: 16/16 tests PASSED. Frontend: Tour Guide Modal, Dashboard with aggregator filtering, Search with aggregator results all working.
critical_code_review_comments: PASS: NewsData.io bug fix - GET /api/aggregators/newsdata returns 200 with articles (not HTTP 422)
PASS: Aggregator status shows newsdata cached_count (GET /api/aggregators/status)
PASS: Search bug fix - GET /api/search?q=Nigeria includes aggregator articles in results
PASS: User prefs integration - GET /api/settings/guest returns aggregator_mediastack/aggregator_newsdata
PASS: Dashboard fetches user prefs and passes aggregator_sources param to /api/news
PASS: Deduplication - DashboardPage.js deduplicates by normalized title (client-side)
PASS: Tour Guide Modal appears on first visit (localStorage 'narvo_tour_completed' check)
PASS: Tour Modal has 5 steps with NEXT/PREV/SKIP buttons (data-testid='tour-guide-modal','tour-next','tour-prev','tour-skip','tour-close')
PASS: Cinematic Audio - Tone.js v15.1.22 loaded (console log visible), Howler.js installed
PASS: cinematicAudio.js exports playBriefingIntro/playBriefingOutro functions integrated in AudioContext.js
PASS: Source filter toggle (ALL_SOURCES, RSS_ONLY, AGGREGATORS) visible on dashboard
PASS: AGGREGATORS filter shows articles with MEDIASTACK badges
PASS: Telemetry sidebar shows AGGREGATOR_APIs: MEDIASTACK 10 ARTICLES, NEWSDATA 10 ARTICLES
test_credentials: Guest mode: Click '[Oya, Play]' button on landing page OR set localStorage.setItem('narvo_guest', 'true')
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 35 tested 6 new features/bug fixes: (1) NewsData.io HTTP 422 bug FIXED - endpoint now returns 200 with articles. (2) Search bug FIXED - GET /api/search?q=Nigeria includes aggregator articles. (3) User prefs integration - DashboardPage fetches /api/settings/guest and passes aggregator_sources to /api/news. (4) Deduplication - client-side in DashboardPage.js by normalized title. (5) Tour Guide Modal - appears on first visit, 5 steps, localStorage 'narvo_tour_completed'. (6) Cinematic Audio - Tone.js loaded, playBriefingIntro/playBriefingOutro integrated in AudioContext.js. Note: Google Fact Check API has MOCK fallback when API key not set.

newsdata_bug_fix.notes: GET /api/aggregators/newsdata returns 200 with articles, not HTTP 422

search_aggregator_bug_fix.notes: GET /api/search?q=Nigeria returns aggregator articles in results

user_prefs_dashboard_integration.notes: DashboardPage fetches user prefs and passes aggregator_sources param

title_deduplication.notes: Client-side deduplication in DashboardPage.js by normalized title

tour_guide_modal.notes: 5-step modal appears on first visit, NEXT/PREV/SKIP/CLOSE buttons work, localStorage flag set

cinematic_audio.notes: Tone.js v15.1.22 loaded, playBriefingIntro/playBriefingOutro functions integrated

mocked_apis.factcheck_service: MOCK fallback when Google Fact Check API key not set

screenshots: .screenshots/iter35_tour_dashboard.png - Tour Guide Modal step 1/5 on dashboard
